channel.title: PI dragon bones on altar?
channel.description: i was wondering if anyone knows how to make it so when you use 1 dbone on the altar it will use every single dbone inside your inventory and give you the right amount of xp for each bones? if anyone knows how to do this pease can you post a tut or maybe point me in the right direction? Thanks
